contentencoded: American investors are pouring money into European stocks as the Euro crisis seems to be subsiding. And now vital signs in China, like retail sales and factory output, are improving. Shaun Rein, Managing Director of the China Market Research Group, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, September 10, 2013

teaser: Vital economic signs in China are improving
title: Strong economic data from China
